OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study . Patients assign 1 2 group . - Group I : Patients receive BMS-247550 IV 3 hour day 1 oral capecitabine twice daily day 1-14 . - Group II : Patients receive BMS-247550 IV 1 hour day 1-3 capecitabine group I . Treatment group repeat every 3 week 2-18 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
